mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_USER (USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_BIRTH, BUSINESS_NUM, USER_REG_DATE, USER_IMG, POINT_POS, USER_STATUS, USER_CLASS) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userNickname}, #{userEmail}, #{userBirth}, #{businessNum}, SYSDATE, #{userImg}, #{pointPos}, #{userStatus}, #{userClass})
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, NVL(USER_NICKNAME, '') AS USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL, NVL(USER_BIRTH, '') AS USER_BIRTH, NVL(BUSINESS_NUM, '') AS BUSINESS_NUM, USER_REG_DATE, NVL(USER_IMG, '') AS USER_IMG, NVL(POINT_POS, 0) AS POINT_POS, USER_STATUS, USER_CLASS FROM TBL_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{value}

SELECT USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, NVL(USER_NICKNAME, '') AS USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL, NVL(USER_BIRTH, '') AS USER_BIRTH, NVL(BUSINESS_NUM, '') AS BUSINESS_NUM, USER_REG_DATE, NVL(USER_IMG, '') AS USER_IMG, NVL(POINT_POS, 0) AS POINT_POS, USER_STATUS, USER_CLASS FROM TBL_USER WHERE BUSINESS_NUM = #{value}

SELECT PRODUCT_SEQ, USER_SELLER_ID, DISCNT_SEQ, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_CONTENT, PRODUCT_BUY_CNT, PAY_PRICE, REVIEW_CNT, PRODUCT_GRADE, PRODUCT_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, PRODUCT_SEQ, USER_SELLER_ID, DISCNT_SEQ, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_CONTENT, PRODUCT_BUY_CNT, PAY_PRICE, REVIEW_CNT, PRODUCT_GRADE, PRODUCT_STATUS FROM (SELECT PRODUCT_SEQ, NVL(USER_SELLER_ID, '') AS USER_SELLER_ID, NVL(DISCNT_SEQ, 0) AS DISCNT_SEQ, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, NVL(PRODUCT_CONTENT, '') AS PRODUCT_CONTENT, NVL(PRODUCT_BUY_CNT, 0) AS PRODUCT_BUY_CNT, PAY_PRICE, NVL(REVIEW_CNT, 0) AS REVIEW_CNT, NVL(PRODUCT_GRADE, 0) AS PRODUCT_GRADE, PRODUCT_STATUS FROM TBL_PRODUCT WHERE USER_SELLER_ID = #{userSellerId} AND PRODUCT_STATUS = 'Y')) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(PRODUCT_SEQ) FROM TBL_PRODUCT WHERE USER_SELLER_ID = #{value} AND PRODUCT_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(PRODUCT_SEQ) FROM TBL_PAY WHERE USER_ID = #{value} AND PAY_STATUS = '1' AND PAY_METHOD = 'p'
SELECT NVL(SUM(A.POINT_VAR), 0) AS POINT_VAR FROM TBL_POINT A, TBL_PAY B WHERE A.PAY_SEQ = B.PAY_SEQ AND A.USER_ID = #{value} AND B.PAY_METHOD = 'p' AND A.POINT_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT NVL(SUM(A.POINT_VAR), 0) AS POINT_VAR FROM TBL_POINT A, TBL_PAY B WHERE A.PAY_SEQ = B.PAY_SEQ AND A.USER_ID = #{value} AND B.PAY_METHOD = 'p' AND A.POINT_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(FR_USER_ID) FROM TBL_FRIEND A, TBL_USER B WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.USER_ID = #{value} AND B.USER_STATUS = '1'
SELECT COUNT(QNA_SEQ) FROM TBL_QNA WHERE USER_ID = #{value} AND QNA_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(REPORT_SEQ) FROM TBL_REPORT WHERE USER_ID = #{value} AND REPORT_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT USER_ID, FR_USER_ID, FR_STATUS, USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_IMG FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, USER_ID, FR_USER_ID, FR_STATUS, USER_NICKNAME, USER_EMAIL, USER_IMG FROM (SELECT A.USER_ID AS USER_ID, A.FR_USER_ID AS FR_USER_ID, A.FR_STATUS AS FR_STATUS, NVL(B.USER_NICKNAME, '') AS USER_NICKNAME, B.USER_EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL, B.USER_IMG AS USER_IMG FROM TBL_FRIEND A, TBL_USER B WHERE A.FR_USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND B.USER_STATUS = '1')) WHERE RNUM >= #{startRow} AND RNUM <= #{endRow}

SELECT A.USER_ID AS USER_ID, A.FR_USER_ID AS FR_USER_ID, NVL(B.USER_NICKNAME, '') AS USER_NICKNAME, B.USER_EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL, A.FR_STATUS AS FR_STATUS FROM TBL_FRIEND A, TBL_USER B WHERE A.FR_USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.USER_ID = #{value} AND B.USER_STATUS = '1'

INSERT INTO TBL_FRIEND (USER_ID, FR_USER_ID, FR_STATUS) VALUES (#{frUserId}, #{userId}, '1')
